keyEvents.title: Marine Battle at Harbor
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats engage in battle with Hina's Marine forces at the Eastern Port while waiting for Vivi.

keyEvents.title: The X Mark Farewell
keyEvents.description: The iconic farewell scene where the Straw Hats and Vivi silently confirm their eternal friendship through the X mark gesture.

keyEvents.title: Nefertari Titi Flashback
keyEvents.description: King Cobra reflects on Queen Titi at the palace, with flashback scenes showing her during her time as queen.

keyEvents.title: Igaram's Impersonation
keyEvents.description: Igaram disguises himself as Vivi to stand in at the coming-of-age ceremony.
